tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SupplyChainIoTData (
  DeviceID INT,
  Timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  SensorType VARCHAR,
  SensorValue FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Predictive_Maintenance_Log (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    prediction_result VARCHAR,
    maintenance_action VARCHAR,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE sensors (
   sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   sensor_name VARCHAR(255),
   device_id INT,
   sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
   sensor_value DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE IoT_devices (
  device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(50),
  device_type VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  last_reported_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Supply_chain (
  shipment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id UUID,
  source_location VARCHAR(100),
  destination_location VARCHAR(100),
  current_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Maintenance_records (
  record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id UUID,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_date DATE,
  technician_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Predictive_maintenance (
  prediction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id UUID,
  prediction_date DATE,
  predicted_issue VARCHAR(100),
  confidence_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    technician VARCHAR(255),
    log_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE predictive_maintenance_analysis (
    analysis_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID,
    analysis_date DATE,
    prediction_result VARCHAR(255),
    confidence_level DECIMAL
);
